thread.title: Deer Park Town Center, Daily Herald team for breast cancer fundraiser
thread.title_full: Deer Park Town Center, Daily Herald team for breast cancer fundraiser - DailyHerald.com

author: Daily Herald report
title: Deer Park Town Center, Daily Herald team for breast cancer fundraiser
text:
The Daily Herald is teaming with Deer Park Town Center on Saturday, Oct. 10, for a fun event to support and raise funds for breast cancer prevention. Color the Town Pink is 10 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. at the center, 20530 N. Rand Road, Deer Park. It will feature exercise programs, a fashion show, a raffle and more. Admission is free, but participants are encouraged to register in advance and make a $15 donation. The first 200 to make a donation will receive a pink event T-shirt, pink gym Quillow, lululemon bag filled with Deer Park Town Center offers, OPI pink nail polish, and other goodies, and five tickets for a raffle for prizes, such as a Brighton bracelet, $100 gift card to your favorite Deer Park Town Center retailer, bras from Lucy, lululemon gift cards, and more. All proceeds will benefit the Advocate Charitable Foundation, which helps provide mammograms for women in underserved areas and for women who are underinsured. Visit events.dailyherald.com/color-the-town-pink .
 Business News Deer Park Charities and Fundraising Health & Fitness
